title: High frequency wood board jointing machine US-CGPB-28P
title_uz: Yuqori chastotali yog'och-taxta birlashtirish uskunasi US-CGPB-28P
title_ru: Высокочастотный стыковочный станок для деревянных досок US-CGPB-28P
title_en: High frequency wood board jointing machine US-CGPB-28P
short_description: This US-CGPB-28P model high-frequency wood board jointing equipment performs the task of gluing and jointing different pieces of wood and board materials together. The working volume of this equipment is 2500 x 1300 mm, and the working thickness is 10 - 50 mm. Also, the pressure of the upper side in the process of gluing wood in the equipment is 9 tons, and the side pressure is 19 tons. The overall dimensions of the equipment are 8700 x 2300 x 2300 mm and the weight is 3500 kg.
short_description_uz: Ushbu US-CGPB-28P modeldagi yuqori chastotali yog'och-taxtani bir-biriga yopishtirish, birlashtirish uskunasi turli xildagi yog'och va taxta materiallari bo'laklarini bir-biriga yelimlab, yopishtirib, birlashtirib berish vazifasini bajaradi. Bu uskunadagi ish hajmi 2500 x 1300 mm bo'lib, ish qalinligi 10 - 50 mmni tashkil etadi. Shuningdek, uskunadagi yog'och yopishtirish jarayonidagi tepa tomonning, ya'ni yuqori tomon bosimi 9 tonna, yon tomon bosimi esa 19 tonna hisoblanadi. Uskunaning umumiy o'lchamlari 8700 x 2300 x 2300 mm hamda og'irligi 3500 kgni tashkil etadi.
short_description_ru: Это высокочастотное оборудование для сращивания древесных плит модели US-CGPB-28P выполняет задачу склеивания и соединения различных кусков дерева и плитных материалов. Рабочий объем этого оборудования 2500 х 1300 мм, а рабочая толщина 10 - 50 мм. Также давление верхней стороны в процессе склеивания древесины в оборудовании составляет 9 тонн, а бокового – 19 тонн. Габаритные размеры оборудования 8700 х 2300 х 2300 мм, а вес 3500 кг.
short_description_en: This US-CGPB-28P model high-frequency wood board jointing equipment performs the task of gluing and jointing different pieces of wood and board materials together. The working volume of this equipment is 2500 x 1300 mm, and the working thickness is 10 - 50 mm. Also, the pressure of the upper side in the process of gluing wood in the equipment is 9 tons, and the side pressure is 19 tons. The overall dimensions of the equipment are 8700 x 2300 x 2300 mm and the weight is 3500 kg.
long_description:
High frequency wood board jointing machine US-CGPB-28P.

Technical parameters of the equipment:

1.   Model  US-CGPB-28P  US-CGPB-46P
2.   Working size  2500 x 1300 mm  2500 x 1300 mm
3.   Working thickness  10 - 50 mm  10 - 80 mm
4.   Up pressure  9 ton  13 ton
5.   Side pressure  19 ton  33 ton
6.   Dimensions  8700 x 2300 x 2300 mm  8700 x 2350 x 2300 mm
7.   Weight  3500 kg  5500 kg
8.   Feeding  automatic  automatic

3.   Ish qalinligi  10 - 50 mm  10 - 80 mm
4.   Yuqori tomon bosimi  9 tonna  13 tonna
